title: Consent Preferences Updated
description: Fired when a user updates their consent preferences, capturing both current and previous state.

purposes.description: Full current state of consent purposes. Key is the purpose name, value is a boolean indicating consent status.

previousPurposes.description: Previous state of consent purposes before the update. Key is the purpose name, value is a boolean indicating consent status.

method.description: Method by which consent preferences were updated.
